description: Triangle T(n,k): T(n,k) = mu(k) if k divides n, T(n,k)=0 otherwise (n >= 1, 1<=k<=n).
mathematica: Clear[t]; t[n_, 1] = 1; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = If[k == 1, 1, If[n == k, -Sum[t[n, k - i], {i, 1, k - 1}], If[n > k, t[n - k, k], 0]]]; Flatten[Table[t[n, k], {n, 13}, {k, n}]] (* Mats Granvik, Feb 12 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 09 2000
